content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How may I assist you with your plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
You won't believe this deal! Buy now and get free service forever! Call now!!! 123-456-7890!!!
It seems like this message is spam. We've noted this on your contact record. If you need home services, please contact us with your details.
reason: Customer sent spam messages with promotional content unrelated to service request
